## Bio
Seamus Stein is a Research Assistant in the Department of Epidimology at Dartmouth College where he is
a member of the Data Management and Biostatistics Core in the Maternal Immunization and Determinants of Infant Immunity Project.
Before joining MADI, he earned his masters degree in Quantitative Biomedical Sciences at Dartmouth and his bachelors in Data Science at Saint Michael's College.

:::
